title: Replace compliance email with support email

requirements.text: Replace all occurrences of 'compliance@stackteacher.com' with 'support@stackteacher.com' across all frontend source files.
acceptanceCriteria: No instance of 'compliance@stackteacher.com' remains anywhere in the frontend source files.
All locations that previously showed 'compliance@stackteacher.com' now display 'support@stackteacher.com'.

constraints: Do not change any other email addresses or contact information.
nonGoals: Modifying any backend logic or data models.
Changing any other branding or content beyond the specified email address.
